column2: Bremen Implementing Act for the EU General Data Protection Regulation (BremDSGVOAG)
Hessian Data Protection and Freedom of Information Act (HDSIG)

column2: Act to adapt the State Data Protection Act and other data protection regulations in the area of ​​responsibility of the Ministry of the Interior and Europe Mecklenburg-West Pomerania to Regulation (EU) 2016/679 and to implement Directive (EU) 2016/680
